name: Tumblr Update - Scroll Button
description: Updated Scroll-To-The-Top button for the new dashboard layout, works with the 2014/10/30 update. Tweaks the button so it is bigger and doesn't interfere with the Xkit button.
additional_info: v1.5 Updated Scroll-To-The-Top button for the new dashboard layout, works with the 2014/10/30 update. Tweaks the button so it is bigger and doesn't interfere with the Xkit button. This is a stand-alone button. Already included in my colored themes. For questions, requests and problems, go to my ask box. For more colors and backgrounds for the new dash, check my Userstyles profile.
